about_the_game:
Asbury Pines is a narrative-based and image-rich idle/incremental game that explores how a grisly murder in a small town of today’s world unfolds across the past and future. Unlock people, places, and upgrades that combine to make resource production engines/systems to further unveil the depths of this grand mystery.

The narrative begins in the present day and stretches across 12 eras of time from the Neolithic epoch to the deep future, each era offering more puzzle and complexity in creating the most efficient, story-unlocking engine. Explore how every aspect of one small town contributes to advancing its mystery: wildlife, worksites, natural landmarks, governments, artifacts, religions, inhabitants, invaders, and more.

As the narrative deepens, manage more and more characters, buildings, and upgrades to seamlessly flow the rewards of one era into another.

Gameplay balances resource management, engine building, story development, and idle progression across hundreds of hours. By the end of the experience you will not only solve the evolution of an epic murder, but learn the hidden secret behind the flow of time.


Features

  • Expansive worldbuilding based on an image-rich narrative experience.
  • Accessible and evolving progression systems that build on unlocked content, characters, and places.
  • Balanced resource management, story development, and progression gameplay across nearly 400 hours.
  • More than 50 characters with 300 stories to discover and utilize.
  • Offline progression.
  • No microtransactions for consistent player experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Higher
  • Processor: ~2.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Higher
  • Processor: ~3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12 and (shader model 4.0) capabilities, e.g. Nvidia GeForce GTX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Video Resolution: 1080p is Highly Recommended

short_description: A grisly murder in a small town unfolds across centuries. Incremental-style interactions with the people, places, and events of Asbury Pines grow resources and build rewarding production engines that unlock a sprawling mystery embedded in the flow of time.
